text:
@Acosta If you're elderly, sick, or in a position to contract COVID-19 by going out, YOU'RE UNABLE TO VOTE IN PERSON. You shouldn't have to choose btwn your health & your  RIGHT TO VOTE.

@PressSec & @realdonaldtrump are against it, cuz the more ppl vote, the more likely they are to LOSE
